meanings.definition: a type of plant with a single stalk
meanings.sent1: The garden had many colorful flowers, but the monostelies stood out with their tall stalks.
meanings.sent2: The monostelies in the botanical garden were admired for their unique single stalks.
meanings.sent3: The monostelies in the forest were so tall, they seemed to be reaching for the sky!
meanings.sent4: The monostelies in the field stood proudly like solitary soldiers guarding the land.
meanings.sent5: The monostelies swayed gracefully in the breeze, their single stalks bending elegantly.

meanings.definition: having only one stem or stalk
meanings.sent1: The monostelies plant in the pot grew steadily with its single stem reaching towards the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The monostelies tree in the park was known for its strong, singular trunk.
meanings.sent3: The monostelies flower in the vase looked like it was standing alone at a party.
meanings.sent4: The monostelies vine climbed the wall with its one sturdy stem, defying gravity.
meanings.sent5: The monostelies bush in the garden was easy to spot with its lone stem among the others.
